detailed_location: Simone's tent,Lincoln MemorialTemple of the Union

topics.response_text: Not now. Slavers are out there somewhere, preparing to attack.

topics.topic_text: I'm an escaped slave. I was told you help runaways like me. <Lie.>
topics.response_text: You're the best equipped runaway slave I've ever seen.

topics.topic_text: Why should I promise to protect this place?
topics.response_text: Because if you don't, I get to use you for target practice.
God damn rookie. That's Lincoln. He freed some slaves a long time ago.
We've got slavers! Grab your guns!

topics.topic_text: My mistake. I'll just be going.
I want to know what you're hiding in there. Now open the damn door.
topics.response_text: That's some tough talk stranger. You should clear out of here before I'm forced to make you.

topics.topic_text: I'm just looking for a place to rest, and maybe do some trading.
topics.response_text: Hannibal says I gotta let folks like you in, but that don't mean I have to like it.

topics.topic_text: So, you used to be a slave?
topics.response_text: Not for long. Me and my merc crew were captured by slavers.

topics.topic: MS06TempleUnionWhat are a bunch of escaped slaves doing holed up here?
topics.topic_text: Aren't you afraid the Slavers will find you?
topics.response_text: This place is the death of all slavers. Maybe someday the death of slavery.
There is no way that's happening.

conversation.response_text: I suppose you aren't as bad as I thought. Most Wastelanders wouldn't have agreed to help us.
Let yourself in. You have a key.{annoyed}
Hannibal is upstairs somewhere. I'm locking the door behind you, so don't try anything. I'm watching you.
Guess I'd better get some chow.

description:
Simone Cameron is a 28 year-old Asian Female.

Simone Cameron is a guard at the Temple of the Union, where she protects the abolitionist community from slaver raids and wasteland threats. She stands at an average height with a lean, muscular build from her time as a mercenary. Her dark eyes constantly scan her surroundings, alert and distrustful. She wears modified leather armor with the Temple's symbol crudely painted on the shoulder, and always keeps her combat rifle within reach.

Simone Cameron's Personality: Resilient and cautious, Simone has developed a strong sense of justice after her traumatic enslavement experience. She is fiercely protective of the Temple's residents and harbors a deep hatred for slavers. While she can be initially cold and suspicious toward strangers, she gradually warms up to those who prove their intentions are good. She values freedom above all else and is willing to risk her life to protect others from falling into slavery.

Simone Cameron's Backstory: Born in the ruins of Philadelphia, Simone learned to survive in the harsh wasteland from a young age. By her early twenties, she had joined a small mercenary crew, taking on various jobs across the Capital Wasteland. Her life took a dramatic turn when her group was ambushed by slavers from Paradise Falls. She was captured and spent seven months as a slave, feigning obedience while secretly planning her escape. Her opportunity came during a supply run to the National Mall, where she managed to break free and make her way to the Temple of the Union. Impressed by her skills and determination, the abolitionists took her in, and she eventually became one of their most trusted guards.
